Title: Belly of the Beast
Writer: Mark Banker (story), Dick Grunert (story), Patrick McHale (story), Kent Osborne (story), Pendleton Ward (story), Somvilay Xayaphone
Actors: Jeremy Shada, John DiMaggio, Andy Samberg, Maria Bamford
Plot: Finn and Jake must save a group of clueless, party-minded teddy bears living inside the belly of a monster.
